TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapAttributes extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用來控制 序列化與還原序列化 SOAP 方法的屬性 (Attribute) 物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the serializes and deserializes SOAP methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立會覆寫預設值的程序方式序列化類別執行個體。Creating a is part of a process that overrides the default way the serializes class instances. 例如，假設您想要序列化物件所建立的 dll 所無法存取的來源。For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL that has an inaccessible source. 使用類別，您可以擴充或控制如何將物件序列化。By using the class, you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized. 成員類別直接對應到一系列控制序列化的屬性類別。The members of the class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization. 例如，屬性必須設為，可讓您藉由指示會覆寫的欄位或屬性序列化序列化為編碼 SOAP 屬性的屬性值。For example, the property must be set to a , which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the to serialize the property value as an encoded SOAP attribute. 控制編碼的 SOAP 序列化的屬性完整清單，請參閱 < [ 控制編碼 SOAP 序列化的屬性](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md)。For a complete list of attributes that control encoded SOAP serialization, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md). 如需詳細資訊，新增的執行個體的相關類別的執行個體類別，請參閱類別概觀。For more details about adding an instance of the class to an instance of the class, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`並`IgnoreThis`欄位和成員`GroupType`列舉型別會覆寫。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法中，會建立，並針對每個覆寫的成員或列舉型別，則會透過適當的屬性設定，並加入。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 會使用建立，且用來建立會覆寫預設序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個成員或類別執行個體正在覆寫其序列化，您必須建立新。For each member or class instance whose serialization is being overridden, you must create a new . 設定的屬性做為適當的成員或物件，然後新增的執行個體類別。Set the properties for the as appropriate to the member or object, then add the to an instance of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`並`IgnoreThis`欄位和成員`GroupType`列舉型別會覆寫。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法中，會建立，並針對每個覆寫的成員或列舉型別，則會透過適當的屬性設定，並加入。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 會使用建立，且用來建立會覆寫預設序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

span.span: A that overrides the behavior of the when the member is serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，如果沒有屬性會套用至公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性，它會序列化為 XML 項目。By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element. 您也可以指示序列化為編碼 SOAP XML 屬性的成員，藉由套用欄位或屬性。You can also instruct the to serialize a member as an encoded SOAP XML attribute by applying a to the field or property. (必須使用建立才能序列化為編碼 SOAP XML 資料流物件。)(The must be created with an in order to serialize an object as an encoded SOAP XML stream.) 屬性可讓您覆寫已套用控制序列化成員。The property allows you to override the serialization controlled by applying a to the member. 如需此程序的詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more details on this process, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`並`IgnoreThis`欄位和成員`GroupType`列舉型別會覆寫。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法中，會建立，並針對每個覆寫的成員或列舉型別，則會透過適當的屬性設定，並加入。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 會使用建立，且用來建立會覆寫預設序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 項目或屬性的預設值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.

value.span: 表示 XML 項目或屬性之預設值的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定預設值的成員可以藉由套用屬性的成員。The default value of a member can be set by applying a attribute to the member. 如果成員序列化為編碼 SOAP 訊息，您可以變更預設值來建立新，將其屬性，並設定物件的屬性。If the member is being serialized as an encoded SOAP message, you can change the default value by creating a new , setting its property, and setting the property to the object. 新增至。Add the to a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more details, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`包含一個名為欄位`GroupName`。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that includes a field named `GroupName`. 預設值設定使用以".NET"。The default value is set with the to ".NET". 藉由不設定 欄位中，或將它設定為".NET"，（因為已經知道的預設值），則不會序列化值。By either not setting the field, or by setting it to ".NET", the value is not serialized (because the default value is already known). 此範例也會覆寫中的預設值`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，它會呼叫`SerializeOverride`方法。The sample also overrides the default value in the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, which is called by the `SerializeOverride` method. 此範例會呼叫這兩種方法中，`SerializeOriginal`並`SerializeOverride`，並設定相同的值 (".NET")`GroupName`欄位。The example calls both methods, `SerializeOriginal` and `SerializeOverride`, and sets the same value (".NET") for the `GroupName` field. 只有在呼叫時，將該值序列化覆寫時，由於`SerializeOverride`方法。Because of the override, the value is serialized only when calling the `SerializeOverride` method. [!code-cpp[SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue/CPP/defvalue.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue/CS/defvalue.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue/VB/defvalue.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來控制類別成員序列化為 XML 項目。The is used to control the serialization of a class member as an XML element. 設定至新的屬性，以覆寫類別成員序列化為 XML 項目建立新並將它指派給屬性。Set the property to a new to override the serialization of a class member as an XML element by creating a new and assigning it to the property. 然後新增至。Then add the to a . 建立具有，然後建構使用。Create an with the , then construct an with the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Transportation`。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation`. 序列化`Vehicle`欄位已覆寫。The serialization of the `Vehicle` field is overridden. 中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法中，會建立，並針對每個覆寫的成員或列舉型別，則會透過適當的屬性設定，並加入。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 會使用建立，且用來建立會覆寫預設序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. span.span: An object that specifies how the serializes an enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來控制序列化列舉成員。The is used to control the serialization of an enumeration member. 設定屬性，以新覆寫這類成員的序列化。Set the property to a new to override the serialization of such a member. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化兩大類別叫做`Food`和`FoodType`。The following example serializes two classes named `Food` and `FoodType`. `FoodType`類別包含兩個列舉型別，會覆寫時，且每個列舉，此範例會建立會將指派給屬性。The `FoodType` class contains two enumerations that are overridden, and for each enumeration, the example creates a that it assigns to the property of a . 範例接著會新增要，這用來建立。The example then adds the to a , which is used to create an . summary.span: 取得或設定數值，指定 是否會將公用欄位或屬性序列化為編碼 SOAP XML。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the serializes a public field or property as encoded SOAP XML.

value.span: 如果 必須不序列化欄位或屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，所有公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性序列化的。By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the . 也就是說，每個公用欄位或屬性的值會保存為 XML 項目或 XML 文件中的 XML 屬性。That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML document. 若要覆寫欄位或屬性的預設序列化，請建立，並將其屬性設`true`。To override the default serialization of a field or property, create a , and set its property to `true`. 使用方法將物件加入至並指定包含要忽略的欄位或屬性的物件型別和欄位或屬性，以略過的名稱。Use the method to add the object to a and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore and the name of the field or property to ignore. 如果會套用至欄位或屬性中，欄位或屬性會被忽略。If a is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored. 不過您可以建立覆寫該行為，將其屬性設`false`，並將它新增至，指定包含的欄位或屬性的物件型別和欄位或屬性的名稱.However you can override that behavior by creating a , setting its property to `false`, and adding it to a , specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property and the name of the field or property. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`並`IgnoreThis`欄位和成員`GroupType`列舉型別會覆寫。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法中，會建立，並針對每個覆寫的成員或列舉型別，則會透過適當的屬性設定，並加入。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 會使用建立，且用來建立會覆寫預設序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用來控制所產生的 XML 資料流。The can be used to control the XML stream generated by the . 設定屬性，以新控制類別序列化時，會產生的 XML 結構描述。Set the property to a new to control the schema for the XML that is generated when a class is serialized. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`並`IgnoreThis`欄位和成員`GroupType`列舉型別會覆寫。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法中，會建立，並針對每個覆寫的成員或列舉型別，則會透過適當的屬性設定，並加入。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 會使用建立，且用來建立會覆寫預設序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]
